doc.previous: Liberia has begun exploration for offshore oil unproven oil reserves may be in excess of one billion barrels 85 The government divided its offshore waters into 17 blocks and began auctioning off exploration licenses for the blocks in 2004 with further auctions in 2007 and 2009 86 87 88 An additional 13 ultra deep offshore blocks were demarcated in 2011 and planned for auction 89 Among the companies to have won licenses are Repsol Chevron Anadarko and Woodside Petroleum 90
